11332122121.content:
John was dragged into the gymnasium with the other cheerleaders- everyone treated him as normal, but he still felt a heavy embarrassment for how you were dressed. However, now he had more pressing issues than his existential embarrassment. John didn’t know the first thing about cheerleading. If the role he was filling was just that of an ordinary cheerleading waving pom-poms in the air, he could probably coast on by, but Stacy was the head cheerleader and there was a lot of technique that he was not the slightest bit aware of.

“Okay Stacy,” the other cheerleaders said, “you sure you can handle this?”

“Wait, I’m not feeling well- I think I should leave.”

They laughed, “we know you, Stacy. We’re not falling for your ‘I’m scared’ jokes anymore. But, please, when we throw you up into the air- remember to tuck in.”

“Tuck what?”

“Something about your jokes never get old,” they laughed.

“No seriously! Tuck what?!”

“And’a one...two...THREE!”

John didn’t know what happened. He felt a series of hands grab and pass him off- and before he knew it, he was flying into the air. His soul was holding on for dear life while the one thing coursing through his brain was: tuck what?

Time stood still. Not as in he was thinking so fast that everything seemed to go slow. Life was on pause. “What’s going on?” He asked before plummeting into a torrential stream of thoughts and experiences. In this stream everything Stacy(the real Stacy) had ever learned or experienced about cheerleading. Try outs, and encyclopedia of maneuvers, partying and being one of the girls on the squad- everything. Pouring into his brain.

Once out, time resumed and he instinctively tucked his hips and spun on the way down for an extra bit of flair.

“Wow Stacy! That was excellent!”

113321221213111.content:
John kept his eyes fixed on the ground. Never was there someone that looked as socially anxious as him that day- it’s doubtful that anyone WAS as socially anxious as him that day.

He got on the bus, careful not to look at a single person as he found an empty spot at the front and sat there.

Five minutes into the ride, he was startled as someone yelled “Boo!” While grabbing his shoulder, and he reflexively shot his eyes in the direction of the person that started him. It was Ben Gurnie, the quarterback of the football team.

After realizing the mistake he made, John did a once over on Ben- relieved and perplexed that he was still wearing his clothes.

“Sorry, I just wanted to have a little fun. That was a pretty funny stunt you pulled at the football game last night.”

“I...lost a bet.” John said whole beginning to recall Stacy’s memories of seeing Ben at all the cheerleading practices. Ben was beginning to feel butterflies in his stomach as the memories began to affect his behavior.

“You’re good, man. I love a good stunt- especially one as funny as that. I didn’t even know you were friends with Stacy.”

“She’s pretty cool,” John said awkwardly as he unknowingly started twirling his hair.

“You think maybe you could introduce me?”

“You like her?” He asked with a bizarre interest.

“I mean...she’s cute.”

“I think I, I mean, SHE would like that.”

“Cool dude,” he said before returning to his friends on the bus.

John returned to normal. Wondering two things: why didn’t the switch happened when he looked at Ben, and what happened to him while he was talking to him. Why was he all goofy when he was talking to Ben? Why did Stacy’s memories fly back to him when he was no longer forced to portray her?

"Okay dear, maybe you should go to the mall with Kelly, or one of your friends, that always makes you feel better," she said as she left.
You growled, and you fall over on your bed, "What is going on, I'm in these ridiculous clothes," you said pulling at your tank top, "And it's normal. Everyone thinks I'm incompetent, but I'm not."
13212.title: Go to your mother about this

choices: A shop you wanted to do to
132122.content:
You sat up, and saw your fourteen year sister, Kelly standing in the door.
"Mum said that you may like to go to the mall," she said, trying to play it cool, and join along in the ride but you could tell she wanted to go, "Could I join you?"
"I'm not sure if I'm going," you sighed feeling a little self-conscious.
She walked over, "Pleases," she begged, widening her eyes.
As much as she could be a nuisance, "Alright, get ready," you said, hoisting your self to your platform supported feet.
Reaching over to your bed side cabinet, but, you couldn't feel any keys.
You began tearing up your room, looking for them, under your pillows, on the floor, under the bed though the drawers.
Sitting back, "Eww," you say, finding something you preferred not too in your underwear draw, "I may not want my clothes back," you say kicking it shut.

"I've looked around here, maybe there downstairs," you say to yourself, going down the stairs, as you continued looking. You still couldn't find them.
Your sister was in the room, "What are you looking for?"
"My keys," you say, dropping a sofa cushion. She walked into the kitchen, her short heel shoes made a gentle clack sound. She reached into a small, shallow dish on the kitchen counter, and pulled out key.
"Here they are John," she says, while handing them to you, "And that is why we put them there. So you can find them again."
She looked up to your face, "Are you going out like that?"
"What do you mean," you asked, feeling confused. "Come here," she said, taking your hand, and took you to your room.
She sat you down on the bed.
"Sit still," she said, opening one of your drawers, and pulling out a make up box.
You cringe, "Come John, I know you want to look your best," she said, and she started to apply it.
"Why are you doing this?" You asked.
She raised a free hand to her lips, "Shh, I'm concentrating," she hissed, "And you always put on too much," she said as if this was perfectly normal.
You had given up, and decided to roll with the strange changes, and let her finish.

"There, all done," she said, stepping back.
With her out of the way, you stood up, "Let's go then," You say going down stairs, and stepping out the front door.
"Going to the mall with Kelly, so you in a little while," you called.
"Have a good time," she called back, as you got into your car.
Kelly walked out too, "See you later, Mum," she waved, walking up to the car.
You turned to her, "What took you so long?"
"Getting a few things you forgot," she said handing you a couple things.
First, was a jacket, it was thin and black, and you put it on the back seat.
Second was a purse, a pink purse that slung over your shoulder, opening it, inside you saw your wallet, a phone and some make-up, along side some perfume. You slipped it down by your seat.
"Ready to go?" You asked, adjusting the mirrors, noticing the furry dice.
"I should be asking you that," she says, and you put the key in the ignition, and turned on the engine.

The car stirred to life, you turned to see Kelly, who was looking at how you were operating the car, shifting the gear, you placed you platform on the gas pedal, setting off.
"Don't forget to flick your indicator stick upwards," she says, as the same time as you doing that. You just forgot about that, and set off.
Making your turn, it was a gentle drive out of town, with Kelly giving directions all the way though.
"Why do you keep giving me directions?" you asked her, feeling a little irritated, when you stopped at a traffic light.
"Because you always forget the way to get there," she says, "Green light."
She had pointed this out, while were acting to this, and were alright moving.
A little later, you came up to a junction, "It's clear, John," she told you, after you had already looked around and were preparing to go again.
Thankfully, the mall wasn't to far away, and you arrive there, quite annoyed by her directions.

You got out of the car, after she provided a lot of help, whether you needed it or not, while parking.
Kelly also stepped out, throwing you your jacket.
"At least it will cover this tank top," You thought to your self, as she walked around and handed you your purse, "But it won't help this."
"Follow me," she says, as she walks in, pulling you by your hand. It wasn't long before you go to your first shop. Kelly dragged you into a shoe shop.
"At least I can change out of these," You thought as you looked at your current footwear.
You walked over to the men's footwear, "No, John," Kelly says, as if speaking to a child, "Your shoes are over here," she said pulling you to another rack. All were woman's shoes, and from what you could tell, they were around your size.
You randomly picked up a pair of hi-heels, which were open topped. "So you like those John, why don't you try them on," she said sitting you down on the seat.
"Why I'm a picking these shoes?" You asked her.
She turned to you, "I don't know, you just picked them up, I guess you liked them."
"No, I mean from this part of the shop?" You specified.
"You always have, when we come shopping, you come here. And they kind of suit you."
You shook you head, taking off your platforms, allowing you to see your bare feet, you had noticed the yellow nail polish before, but not you could see toe rings on several toes.
You brushed that aside, and slipped your feet into the heels. And stood up in the them, and you didn't feel strange, you kind of liked it, and you were very capable of standing in them. You took a few steps, you hips accidental swinging a little.
"I see you like those ones, you should get them."
You sighed, and looked around, you were standing in heels, baggy trousers, a tank top and a feminine jacket, yet, no one commented on it at all.
You took of the heels but before you could put the others on, you were handed another pair. They looked like trainers, but had a sole as thick as the shoes you brought.
"I think you'll like these," she said sitting next to you.
"I think I have enough shoes," you said putting them on a self.
"That's not like you, normally your trying to get all the shoes you can. But okay if you don't want to, you don't have to."
"That's a bit of a relief," You thought, putting the platform sandals on again.
Your sister picked up the heels, along with a pair she had chosen, "Lets go to the check out."
You didn't intend to buy them, but you didn't want to argue with what you are like or were like.
After paying for the pairs or shoes, and slung the bag over your back, you left.
"Where now?" she asked.
132122.title: Kelly comes in

choices: Clothes swap, my turn to choose,"
1321222.content:
"Where do you want to go now," Kelly asked you, and you began to brush your lip with one finger tip, thinking of where you would like to do.
"I think the game stores," You replied quickly. Kelly shook her head, "I should have know."
It wasn't a long way to walk to get there.

The two of you stepped into the store, and then you started to look around, all the while Kelly, sticking by your side.
One of the shop employees approached you "Can I help you with anything?"
But before you could say anything, "John's just looking around at the moment, We'll call if we need anything," she smiled.
The employee nodded, and turned to help one of the other customers.
"Why didn't you let me talk?"
"Because you often end up asking to many questions that are a little unnecessary for the employee to handle, and then ramble on about the games you've played," she explained, and you gave a little forceful growl.
You moved on the the next shelf, "Not those John," she said pushing you a couple shelves on, "We don't have an Xbox 1,"
Looking up, you saw the shelf was labeled 'Xbox 1'.
She left go of both your arms, when she moved you to a shelf stacked wit games from a console you had.
You picked up mass effect, pinching the top, and sliding it up, then Kelly pushed your hand down, "I think that one's a little hard John."
You continued looking, then trying dark souls, she did the same, "That one too."
You moved on from Xbox games, the next isle was the 3DS isle. Looking though it, nothing was too interesting, but then one game, and you couldn't explain why, 'New style Boutique' caught you attention, so you picked it up.
"That looks nice, maybe you should get it," Kelly suggested, and you decided to get it, and went to purchase it.

Stepping out side, "Before we can go anywhere else, can we go to the toilets,"
"Yeah, I kind of need it too," you replied.
And the too of you walked a little way to the nears toilets.
You stopped dead in your place, "I'm still a boy, but everyone is pushing me to girly clothes and make up. Would I look stupid if I asked, They all already think I am," You thought over your internal dilemma.
Kelly noticed this, she then put both hands on one of your arm, and pushed you, "That one," she smiled, pushing you towards the boys bathroom.
"I'll be waiting out here when I'm done, just call if you need me," she said, making her way to the girls toilet.
"Do I really need help to go to the toilet," You thought, dropping you head, "If this is what the the person I swapped with clothes with is like, I pity her."
Going in, you stepped into a stall, not wanting to be seen, and locked the door.
You undid your baggy jeans, and saw something.
"I'm also wearing panties," you sigh, getting used to accepting these changes, as you looked a the pink ladies underwear, encasing your groin quite snugly, even a little tight.
You then realized what this meant, you gulped, as you took hold of the end of your tank top, as your pants dropped, but that wasn't you concern at your moment, and rolled it up, and it got to your neck, around of your chest, a bra hung from your shoulders, and it tied up behind you back.
You dropped the tank top, and it rolled down, covering your bra.
But all the while, with all your changes, and discomfort, you enjoyed the feel, you like the look it gave, and the soft the feel.
You lowered your panties, and relieved your self.
You pulled up your baggy pants, and buttoned them up, and left. Pouring soap into your hands, and rising of the soapy suds.
And you left. You saw Kelly, "Did you do alright?"
You did an internal face palm, and with a irritated voice, "Hgghh, Yes,"
"John, I'm sorry if I'm annoying you, but I know your vulnerable, I'm just making sure your self."
You understand that, she was a caring person and looking out for you.
"Hold up your hand," she said, as you did, she smelt then, "Good, soap. Now, we should go to the...."
1321222.title: A shop you wanted to do to

13212221.content:
Food court," she said turning around, after taking hold of your hand, "I'm Starving."
And before you could agree with her, she started dragging you in the direction of the food court, almost pulling of your platform shoes.

It didn't take long to get there, "Which one would like to go to, John?"
You rotated your head, looking at all the available shops, you choose Pizza hut, and made your way there.
As you jointed the back of the line, Kelly asked you something.
"What do you want to order?" to which you told her that you wanted your regular, hoping this new you came here as often as you used too.
Kelly nodded, and guided you along the queue.
You waited in the line, fidgeting in your clothes, salivating a little, from the anticipation of your hot pizza meal.
Kelly laughed, "Looking forward to it?" she asked, seeing a look of eager in your eye.
"Yeah," you say, as a little dribble escaped, but Kelly quickly wiped with a napkin.

The two of you got to the front of the line, and Kelly placed your order.

You both tucked in.

A loud knocking came from the door, filling you will dread. Quickly scanning yourself over, "I can be seen like this," you flustered under your breath.
John felt as rush as he propelled his way to and though the front room, and up the stairs, stumbling more and more on the ridiculous heels he now wore, but stood back up, repeating the same thought over and over again in his head, "I've got to get changed."

A step away from the stairs, he heard the same knock, causing a shock, as he trip on his clear heels again, landing on the stairs with a loud thud, "OW," he cried, grabbing onto the hand rail, and pulling him self up with both arms, only just keeping him self steady.

A wave of dread, worse then the first one washed over John, as the sound of metal scratching, interlocking and clicking sounded behind him, and the door sung open, John swiveled his head around to see his friend Steve was at the door, "Crap, he say me," John thought.

"Glad to see you made it home last night, John," he says slipping the key to your front door in his pocket, "Are you alright, it sounded lie you fell down."

"Why didn't he say anything?" "I'm...Fine," John claim on shaky knees.

Steve gave a puzzled look, and seemed lost for words, "You sober, but your legs seem drunk at least," he laughed.

"It's these stupid heel, and these pants are doing anything to help," John complain.

"Are you sure your alright, maybe you should sit down."

John blushed, and with a hushed tone, "Could you help?"
Steve smiled, and grabbed John's hand, and though it over his shoulder, pulling John up, giving him support, although each step was still uneasy
"You must be really drunk," he laughed.
John grunted, "Why do you think I've been drinking, maybe it's because these heels are impossible to walk in."

"Now I know your drunk, you go every where in heels. That must have been some party," He says as he lays John down in a seat.

"What party!?" John asked, getting frustrated.

"I shout have gone to that party if it did this to you," He says dropping next to you.

"What the heck are you talking about, Steve!?"

"Come on John, your the most party hard guy I know, you asked me to check up on you each morning, to make sure your good the day after. Anyway, perhaps a party would make you feel better, Stacy's little sisters birthday to day, tame for you, but a party nether the less."

"Stacy, the cheerleader?" John asks, "Why would we go there?"

"Well, you look like you could do with a little uplifting, and I want to make a move on the birthday girls sister," He plotted, "So, you coming?"

And attempted the same this with the capri's, but found it harder, the tighter leg wear fixed to his thighs, but finally got it off by rolling it down his legs. John dropped onto the bed, noting anther change to his attire, his boxers were gone, and replaced by ridiculous hot pink underwear, 'his' panties having frills around the top, but were incredible tight, outlining his manhood, and butt cheeks, each almost leaking out, in addition, his chest was encased in a bra, it was thin material, but just as tight, but only covered half of his chest.

Next to his bed, the bedside cabinet had a mirror on with an array of make up. Looking in it, he realized how much he was wearing, his lips were a deep red, his cheeks were lighted, and his eyes were heavily covered.
"Who could have the time to set up a prank like this?" he said in shock and frustration, opening the wardrobe, he saw all of his clothes had been replaced.

As you stand up to go to the kitchen, you immediately feel rather strange; your shoulders and legs seem a bit exposed. Looking down, you realize the issue: You're wearing a slinky, glittering red dress that, strangely enough, seems to fit you perfectly, barring the cleavage window clearly meant for cups in mind. Simple straps over your red-painted toes mean anyone who is interested has a full view of your feet, and most chillingly, the ankle straps are adorned with small padlocks.

Padlocks that don't appear to have a key.

And what's more, you're not wearing any undergarments.

"Okay... Okay John, this is all a... [i]all[/i] just some crazy dream..." you mutter to yourself, running a hand through your hair; hair which appears to be much thicker and longer than before. Giving a shiver, you glance to the mirror in the hallway parallel to your current position. You see yourself clad in an outfit worthy of Jessica Rabbit, your hair now spilling down to your exposed back and framing your face. Your face is heavily made up, with a thick red lipstick which makes your lips seem quite pouty, smoky eye shadow that brings out the color of your eyes, eyelashes that are longer than they should be, and any roughness in your face smoothed over. Star-shaped earrings complete the picture.

You've become a crossdresser. A crossdresser that, oddly enough, is rocking their mysterious new outfit. And you stand there paralyzed, trembling, unsure of what to do about it.

15.content:
How else does John's power work?

1. He swaps clothing with a person (girl or boy) he happens to think about. He thinks about his girlfriend and instantly finds himself wearing what outfit she happens to be wearing while she gains his clothing.

2. He swaps clothing with a person (boy or girl) who is thinking about him. John has no control over this power, he finds himself wearing different clothing and being treated differently at seemingly random moments. The swaps last from a few minutes to a few days.

3. He swaps clothing with a person (girl or boy) he wants to help or feels sorry for. There is a catch to this clothing swap... He is treated like that person even though he himself does not change physically. He swaps back when the issue that made John feel sorry about the person is resolved.

Which option do you dare try?

info.brief_description: You start to swap clothes with other girls in different storylines.
info.description:
Your name is John.
18 years old average guy, likes to play videogames, watching football and hanging out with his friends

Somehow you have to ability to swap clothes with girls only without knowing one day it suddenly happens

There are different situations where you can choose from

50 points for a option chapter, 200 points for a long chapter.

rules.

1 When John swaps a item of clothing with someone, say a girl, only he notices that
something is not right. To everyone else, its common place. As if it was perfectly
normal for a boy to wear a skirt or a dress.

2. When John swaps a full outfit with a girl, people still treat him like a boy and
that girl is treated like a girl. They do not change gender.



Rules
No deaths
No sex
No endings
